text:
Happy birthday, Penelope Disick!

Kourtney Kardashian's daughter turned 5 years old on Saturday, and the Kardashian family couldn't help but celebrate on social media.

EXCLUSIVE: Kourtney Kardashian and Younes Bendjima Hit Up Le Club 55 in St. Tropez in Coordinating Ensembles

Kourtney took to Snapchat to share pics of Penelope's birthday celebrations, writing "My angel is 5!"

The 36-year-old reality star also took to Instagram to share cute videos of Penelope's science experiment.

part 1 A post shared by Kourtney Kardashian (@kourtneykardash) on Jul 8, 2017 at 2:40pm PDT

part 2 A post shared by Kourtney Kardashian (@kourtneykardash) on Jul 8, 2017 at 2:40pm PDT

WATCH: Penelope Disick Hilariously Ranks Her Aunts While Filming 'KUWTK' With Dad Scott Disick

"Happy birthday to our sweet princess, our little mermaid Penelope!!" Kris Jenner wrote alongside a photo collage of Penelope. "We love you so much, precious angel!! ❤ #HappyBirthdayPenelope #Angel #sweetgirl #family."

Happy birthday to our sweet princess, our little mermaid Penelope!! We love you so much, precious angel!! ❤ #HappyBirthdayPenelope #Angel #sweetgirl #family A post shared by Kris Jenner (@krisjenner) on Jul 8, 2017 at 9:46am PDT

WATCH: Penelope Disick Gets $1 After Grandma Kris Jenner Curses in Front of Her and It's the Cutest

"Happy Birthday my sweet P! Thank you for being the best friend to my North! I love you!" Kim Kardashian wrote alongside a sweet photo of Penelope and her daughter, North, before sharing video of the girls' "party planning."

Happy Birthday my sweet P! Thank you for being the best friend to my North! I love you! A post shared by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on Jul 8, 2017 at 9:46am PDT

Party Planning A post shared by Kim Kardashian West (@kimkardashian) on Jul 8, 2017 at 2:26pm PDT

RELATED: Penelope and Reign Disick Offer Up Donuts While Dream Kardashian Is the Picture of Cuteness: Pics!

Penelope and North celebrated their birthdays with a joint Moana-themed birthday party last month. See more in the video below.
title: Penelope Disick Turns 5! See Her Sweet Tributes From the Kardashian Family!
